manasika saukhya pirihunu pudgalayan samaja sanwardhanayata dayaka kara ganime aramunin, basnahira palath samaja sewa departhamenthuwa wisin rata pura kriyathmaka kerena “sathya gaweshi” kalina samaja gatalu wimasana samaja kathikawan malawe, mema wasarata adala prathama wadasatahana ingiriya pradeshiya lekam karyalayiya shrawanagarayedi pasugiyada pawathwini.ingiriya pradeshiya lekam karyalayiya samaja sewa anshaya, basnahira palath samaja sewa departhamenthuwa samangin ekwa pawathwana lada mema samaja kathikawatha, basnahira palath samaja sewa amathi jagath angage mahathage pradhana sahabhagithwayen pawathi athara mehidi kalina manasika rogi samaja gatalu rashiyak pilibanda sakachcha karana ladi.basnahira palath samaja sewa adhyakshika anusha gokula pranandu, lunawa rohale waidya niladhari di.jegaruban, horana mulika rohale waidya dipal pranandu yana mahathma mahathmihuda ingiriya pradeshiya lekam karyalaye samaja sewa niladharini nelupani menewiyada mehidi raswa siti pirisa amatha wisheshitha deshana pawathwu athara, manasika roga sambandha kalina gatalu pilibanda wiwrutha kathikawathakda raswa siti pirisa samangin pawathwini.basnahira palath sabha manthri yasapala koralage, basnahira palath aayurweda komasaris nimal karunasiri, horana pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi yamith chandana hathurusinha, upa sabhapathi ashoka ranathunga yana mahathwarunda, ingiriya pradeshiya lekam karyalaya, ingiriya polisiya, ingiriya rohala, ingiriya saukhya waidya karyalaya, basnahira palath samaja sewa departhamenthuwa, ingiriya wadihiti bala mandalaya aadi kshethra rasak niyojanaya karamin niladharihu wishala pirisakda mema awasthawata sahabhagi wuha..

bohoma watina lipiyak dinesh.mamath deweni loka yuddhaya gana bohoma unandu kenek.wishesha hethuwa thamayi ithihasaye siduwunu waradim yali yali sidu nowiya yuthuyi kiyana thadabala mathayaka mama inna eka.boho kalayak indan mamath hithagena innawa deweni loka yuddhaya gana lipiyak liyanna.eeth me tharam sarthakawa nam mata liyanna bari bawa mama hondakarawama dannawa.me langadi mama kiyewwa honda pothak (pariwarthanayak) eeke nama niyurembarg awasan jawanikawaee polthorek kiyala rusiyan nithignyayek liyapu niyurembarg epilog kiyana pothe pariwarthanaya.deweni loka yuddhayen passe yuddhayata sambandha wunu ayata danduwam karanna mithra parshika ratawal athi kara gaththu yudha adhikaranayaka mula sita thindhuwa dena thuru siduwim apuruwata liyala thiyenawa.batahira ratawal wala debidi gathiya ehemath hondin danena widihata eeka liyala thiyenawa.hoyagena kiyawanna eekathshindlars list, da boyi in stripd pijamas, layif ees biyutiful wage film ehema balala athi kiyala hithanawa.

sapugaskanda yoshida pihinum pasala saha biyagama pihinum, kimidum ha jiwitharakshaka puhunu sangamaya thunwana waratath meheyawana lada 2011 wasare pita palath pihinum tharagawaliye surathawa raddoluwa dolpin pihinum samajaya wisin dina ganu labiya.ehi anu surathawa migamuwa tayigar shak pihinum samajayata himiwiya.mehi pasal pirimi surathawa kalaniya janadhipathi widyalayatath, balika surathawa kiribathgoda wihara maha dewi balika widyalayatath sathuwuha.mishra pasal surathawa dina ganna ladde sapugaskanda yoshida shokanji jathyanthara pasala wisini.japanaye pradhana sanghanayaka ha yoshida adhyapana aayathanaye widhayaka adhyaksha banagala upathissa nahimiyo mehi pradhana aaradhitha amuththa wuha.me awasthawata basnahira palath sabha manthri jorj perera ha gampaha nawaloka tharuna sanwardhana puhunu madhyasthanaye sabhapathi wisheshagnya waidya wilprad wijesinha yana mahathwaru da maha bodhi samagame adhyakshika ambapali sikuradhipathi mahathmiya da sahabhagi wuha.me tharagawaliye di shuratha dinu kridaka kridikawan meseya.awurudu 10n pahala - pirimi - aanjel perera (puththalama disthrik pihinum sangamaya) kantha - senali wirawansha (tayigar shak pihinum samajaya) awurudu 12n pahala - pirimi - sugiri kamel (tayigar shak pihinum samajaya) kantha - pramodi malshika (wihara maha dewi balika widyalaya) awurudu 14n pahala - pirimi – dineth sanjula jayakodi (tayigar shak pihinum samajaya) kantha - chamodi fonseka (dolpin pihinum samajaya) awurudu 16n pahala - pirimi - thuwan dilshan (waththala oo ke ayi jathyanthara pasala) kantha - jerusha marina (waththala oo ke ayi jathyanthara pasala) awurudu 19n pahala - pirimi - ji. es. nadira perera (galahitiyawa jathika pasala) kantha - dilini sawindya (horana thakshila madhya maha widyalaya) awurudu 19n ihala - pirimi - dabliw.
